name: Agência Portuguesa do Transporte Marítimo de Curta Distâncoa
goal:
The purpose of the Agency is to promote Short Sea Shipping, National Cabotage and Inland wateways traffic, as well as to promote intermodality with other complementary modes of transport.

Specific Goals:

A) Provide specific information on aspects related to the SSS, such as line services, departures and ports of destination;
B) Disseminate information on SSS-related projects and intermodality with complementary modes of transport;
C) Support and promote international projects, partnerships and contacts;
D) To accede to the network of organizations of promotion of the SSS of other European countries;
E) To carry out or participate in the preparation of studies and projects promoted by the European Union or other entities;
(F) obtain and provide all available information on the possibilities of access to short sea shipping with Europe, and in particular intermodal door-to-door transport;
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: SPC Portugal is part of direction members of the European Shortsea Network: aiming to follow maritime strategy and the iniciatives concerning SSS. Aiming to disseminate it within its associates and national bodies.
